original_text: In the fortieth year, on the first day of the eleventh month, Moses spoke to the people of Israel according to all that the Lord had given him in commandment to them,
korean_text: 마흔째 해 열한째 달 그 달 첫째 날에 모세가 이스라엘 자손에게 여호와께서 그들을 위하여 자기에게 주신 명령을 다 알렸으나

sentences.original_text: on the first day of the eleventh month,
Moses spoke to the people of Israel
according to all that the Lord had given him
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그에게 주신 모든 것에 따라,
